snippet.title: Spells & Secrets - Announcement Trailer | PS5 Games
snippet.description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10005788

Grab a friend and tackle the multiple threats that took over the school of Greifenstein together in Spells & Secrets, a unique co-op rogue-lite inspired action adventure game for family and friends to enjoy. 

Jump headfirst into the action in an all-out offensive or strategically equip your wizards with unique spells that complement each other's playstyle. Quick movement and even quicker use of spells will allow you to chain spells together to unleash devastating combinations against enemies, all that while solving the many secrets lurking within the School walls.

Spells & Secrets is coming soon to PlayStation 5.

#ps5games #ps5
